channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI's Meta makeover
item.description: Facebook's meteoric rise two decades ago offers OpenAI a rich but potentially treacherous playbook for the ChatGPT maker to defend and expand its lead...

item.title: Trump and Vance differ in their responses to latest Epstein files
item.description: The Justice Department last week released the final 3 million-plus Epstein files — but President Trump and Vice President JD Vance appear to diverge o...

item.title: Exclusive: Majority of Trump voters back solar power, poll finds
item.description: A majority of Trump-coalition voters back solar power, especially if the panels are made in the U.S. and without Chinese materials, polling shared exc...

item.title: The economy is the world's most important problem, but not America's
item.description: Data: Gallup ; Note: Margin of error ranges between +/- 2.4 and 4.7 percentage points; Chart: Axios Visuals Americans say the country's biggest proble...

item.title: The risk for the growing pool of everyday investors
item.description: Once called "dumb money," everyday investors —people trading via Robinhood, Schwab and the like—are now collectively big enough to have sway over the ...

item.title: Gavin Newsom sat by his mother during her assisted suicide, and came to terms with anger and grief
item.description: The governor and potential presidential candidate spoke about his mother’s controversial decision to end her life and the impact it had on his politic...

item.title: Standoff over ICE tactics could trigger another partial government shutdown
item.description: Democrats have demanded that Republicans agree to accountability measures to rein in personnel from Immigration and Customs Enforcement and other agen...

item.title: Defense Dept. effort to punish Mark Kelly draws skepticism from judge
item.description: A federal judge said Pete Hegseth appeared to be expanding restrictions on free speech that have applied only to active-duty service members.

item.title: Texas Democrats taste victory, then turn on each other
item.description: Days after their win in a state Senate race, reports of a racially charged comment roil the U.S. Senate primary contest.

item.title: Trump plans to install Christopher Columbus statue outside White House
item.description: The president has worked to recognize the explorer, saying Italian-Americans should “remember” Trump’s efforts when they go vote.

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
